name: A Celestial Journey
description:
Alter Learning Virtual Science Lab

Quick Summary: This is a game about space exploration. You start off in a spaceship and move through the solar system passing by many planets. The classroom blackboard will display information about each planet as you pass by it (uses scriptable objects). You will be able to hover over the planets and see core information regarding it (temperature, mass, radius, gravity, etc) Setting: You will be able to visit Earth, Moon, Mars, Europa, and Titan. Each planet is unique and will have areas of interest that will explain it more. Interactivity: The player will be able to move freely around each planet and will be able to jump around while experiencing realistic gravity simulation. The player will be able to pick up rocks and see information explaining their nature. The goal of the game is to explore all the planets and learn something new about each of them. Affect: The emotion this game is trying to make is feeling excited to learn about Astronomy.

Each world will contain areas of interest that you can interact with.
